resources.string: Oh, no! It seems that your NXT robot is not switched on. Please make sure that your NXT robot is on and has Bluetooth switched on and then try to connect again.
Please, try to connect again after pairing the device.
You need to enable Bluetooth first!"
Connecting to your NXT robot. Please wait…
Remote control for LEGO Mindstorms NXT 2.0

Looking for more info?
Maybe the source code?
Have a request?
Found a bug?!?
Just want to get in touch? :)

Drop me an e-mail:
carlos.rafael@bandtec.com.br
or visit the application's project site on GitHub:
https://github.com/BandTec/NXTControl

This project is based on the following open source projects:

LEGO-MINDSTORMS-MINDdroid
https://github.com/NXT/LEGO-MINDSTORMS-MINDdroid

FPlayAndroid
https://github.com/carlosrafaelgn/FPlayAndroid

The font used to draw the scalable icons, icons.ttf, was created using IcoMoon App, by Keyamoon, available at:
http://icomoon.io/app

Some of the scalable icons were created by me and some came from the IcoMoon Free icon set, by Keyamoon, licensed under the Creative Commons License 3.0.

NXT Control is licensed under the terms of the GPLv3. See http://gplv3.fsf.org for more details.
